testcase.classname: User could click on slider wrapper
testcase.name: Click on Nokia banner on responsive slider wrapper

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [http://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given Click on Nokia banner controller......................................passed When Click on Nokia banner..................................................passed Then User could click on the banner and redirect to the Nokia link..........failed
